name: I Could Be a Mirror if I Tried Hard Enough
name_original: I Could Be a Mirror if I Tried Hard Enough
description:
You are a window who wants to be a mirror

Trick others into thinking that you are a mirror by moving and flipping objects on the left side of the screen so that they mirror the right side of the screen.

Take advantage of people's slow reaction time to follow your dreams!

Controls

Left Click - Drag object

Right Click - Flip object

Esc - Level select
